name: xrsh
tagline: A self-hosted remote shell platform for browser-based terminal access to remote systems
description: xrsh is a self-hosted remote shell access platform that exposes command-line environments through a browser-based terminal, letting users reach remote systems securely without native SSH clients.

features.title: Browser
features.description: Access remote shells through any modern web browser without installing SSH clients

features.title: End-to-End Encryption
features.description: Establish encrypted SSH connections over HTTPS with certificate-based authentication

features.title: Session Persistence
features.description: Resume disconnected terminal sessions automatically when network connectivity returns

features.title: Multi
features.description: Open multiple terminal sessions in browser tabs for parallel remote work

features.title: Copy
features.description: Transfer text between local clipboard and remote terminal with keyboard shortcuts

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Use terminals on mobile devices and tablets with touch-optimized controls

features.title: Customizable Appearance
features.description: Adjust font sizes, color schemes, and terminal dimensions for comfortable viewing

features.title: Keyboard Mapping
features.description: Configure custom key bindings and shortcuts to match local terminal preferences
